None.Name: Gift of Strength
None.Description: Upheaval of strength. Every friendly unit in the current game will deal 20% more damage. Lasts until building is destroyed.

None.Name: Gift of Resilience
None.Description: Growth of toughness. Every friendly unit in the current game will take 20% less damage. Lasts until building is destroyed.

None.Name: Gift of Juvenescence
None.Description: Powerful regeneration. Every friendly unit in the current game will regenerate 3% of its maximum lifepoints every 4 seconds. Lasts until building is destroyed.

en.Description:
Lifepoints +90
New Ability: Gift of Juvenescence

de.Description:
Lifepoints +90
New Ability: Gift of Juvenescence

ru.Description:
Lifepoints +90
New Ability: Gift of Juvenescence

Extra.en: Although you can put as many wheels as possible to one buff provided that you select them in the animation time of one wheel,  only one buff applies. For example,  you can activate 3 Gifts of Strength if you're quick,  but the damage bonus will still be 20%. However,  is is possible to have all three different gifts active at the same time with a new wheel for each gift.
Extra.de: Although you can put as many wheels as possible to one buff provided that you select them in the animation time of one wheel,  only one buff applies. For example,  you can activate 3 Gifts of Strength if you're quick,  but the damage bonus will still be 20%. However,  is is possible to have all three different gifts active at the same time with a new wheel for each gift.

For example,  you can activate 3 Gifts of Strength if you're quick,  but the damage bonus will still be 20%. However,  is is possible to have all three different gifts active at the same time with a new wheel for each gift.
